sqlMap.sql: SELECT TO_NUMBER(B.ISSUE_RESULT_CODE) AS ISSUE_RESULT_CODE ,A.ISSUE_CODE ,A.ISSUE_NAME ,B.ISSUE_RESULT_CONTENT ,B.ISSUE_RESULT_DAY ,A.ISSUE_EVENT_DAY ,B.ISSUE_RESULT_STATUS ,D.ISLEV_NAME AS ISSUE_LEVEL ,C.EMP_NAME AS EMP_DAMDANG ,B.ISSUE_RESULT_HIT ,B.RISK_HIT ,D.ISLEV_NAME ,C.EMP_NAME FROM ISSUE A, ISSUE_RESULT B, EMP C, ISLEV D, PW E WHERE A.EMP_DAMDANG = C.EMP_CODE and A.ISSUE_CODE = B.ISSUE_CODE AND A.ISSUE_LEVEL = D.ISLEV_CODE AND A.PW_CODE = E.PW_CODE AND E.PROJECT_CODE = #project_code#

SELECT TO_NUMBER(B.ISSUE_RESULT_CODE) AS ISSUE_RESULT_CODE ,A.ISSUE_CODE ,A.ISSUE_NAME ,B.ISSUE_RESULT_CONTENT ,B.ISSUE_RESULT_DAY ,A.ISSUE_EVENT_DAY ,B.ISSUE_RESULT_STATUS ,D.ISLEV_NAME AS ISSUE_LEVEL ,C.EMP_NAME AS EMP_CODE_IR ,B.ISSUE_RESULT_HIT ,B.RISK_HIT ,D.ISLEV_NAME ,C.EMP_NAME FROM ISSUE A, ISSUE_RESULT B, EMP C, ISLEV D WHERE A.EMP_DAMDANG = C.EMP_CODE AND A.ISSUE_CODE = B.ISSUE_CODE AND A.ISSUE_LEVEL = D.ISLEV_CODE
sqlMap.select: SELECT B.ISSUE_RESULT_CODE ,A.ISSUE_CODE ,A.ISSUE_NAME ,A.ISSUE_CONTENT ,B.ISSUE_RESULT_CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(issue_event_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as issue_event_day ,TO_CHAR(issue_result_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as issue_result_day ,B.ISSUE_RESULT_STATUS ,A.ISSUE_LEVEL ,C.EMP_NAME AS EMP_CODE_IR ,B.RISK_HIT FROM ISSUE A, ISSUE_RESULT B, EMP C, ISLEV D WHERE A.EMP_DAMDANG = C.EMP_CODE AND A.ISSUE_LEVEL = D.ISLEV_CODE AND A.ISSUE_CODE = B.ISSUE_CODE AND B.ISSUE_RESULT_CODE = #issue_result_code#

SELECT B.ISSUE_RESULT_CODE ,A.ISSUE_CODE ,A.ISSUE_NAME ,A.ISSUE_CONTENT ,B.ISSUE_RESULT_CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(issue_event_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as issue_event_day ,TO_CHAR(issue_result_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as issue_result_day ,B.ISSUE_RESULT_STATUS ,A.ISSUE_LEVEL ,C.EMP_NAME AS EMP_CODE_IR ,B.RISK_HIT FROM ISSUE A, ISSUE_RESULT B, EMP C, ISLEV D WHERE B.EMP_CODE_IR = C.EMP_CODE AND A.ISSUE_LEVEL = D.ISLEV_CODE AND A.ISSUE_CODE = B.ISSUE_CODE AND A.ISSUE_CODE = #issue_code#

ORDER BY ISSUE_RESULT_CODE) A ) B
WHERE B.RNUM <= #startCount# AND B.RNUM >= #endCount#
ORDER BY B.RNUM DESC
